description: A stylishly designed Penthouse is available with 516 square feet of space and a rental rate of Rs 25,000 which is quite affordable. You will get 5 bedroom at the Penthouse along with 3 bathrooms as well and 1 parking making it suitable for a small family, working bachelor or female only. The prime location of Goregaon West in Mumbai is a key USP for the property since it is located close to public transportation in a safe & secure neighborhood. This is a garden facing Penthouse with a nice view on the 2nd floor of a 4 storied building and is 10+ years old while being semi-furnished. Community amenities include a cycling cum jogging track, playing zone for children, large green zone and 24 hour security.

keywords: spacious, prime, competitive, family, public transportation

description: Enjoy renting a spacious 870 square feet Penthouse in a prime location at a competitive rate of Rs 4,80,009. Residents will enjoy 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and 2 parking facility at this property, making it suitable for family. The property lies close to public transportation in sector 45, one of Gurgaon's poshest localities. This stylishly designed property faces the north west while being 5-7 years old and lies on the 10th floor of a 20 storied building. It is a furnished unit. Community amenities include 24 hour security services, playing zones for children, power backup and more.

description: Providing 650 square feet of space, this Penthouse comes for a breakthrough rental rate of Rs 50,00,034. This stylishly designed and well-ventilated Penthouse comes with 2.5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 1 parking facility, being ideal for a family. The prime location of sector 100, Noida is a big plus point for this property since it is close to public transportation. 2-4 years old, this property faces the west while offering a nice view to residents on the 14th floor of a 21 storied building. It is furnished for maximum comfort. You can expect power backup and 24 hour security services for the Penthouse along with medical facilities.

amenities: 24 hour security, badminton court, inbuilt wardrobes, clubhouse, central air conditioning, central wi-fi, concierge desk, food court, conference room, gymnasium, home automation and swimming pool
description: Offering 1800 square feet of area, this stylishly designed Penthouse available for rent at a breakthrough rate of Rs 33,500. You can enjoy 4 spacious bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and 2 parking spaces ideally suitable for families and bachelors in this Penthouse. The Penthouse lies along the vital Bannerghatta Road in Bangalore which is a safe & secure locality. This unfurnished and northeast facing property is 2-4 years old. Total numbers of floors in the building is 7 and the Penthouse lies on the 6th floor. Some of the best amenities include 24 hour security, badminton court, inbuilt wardrobes, clubhouse, central air conditioning, central Wi-Fi, concierge desk, food court, conference room, gymnasium, home automation and swimming pool among many others.
